With the blue dollar rate, costs can be 60-70% less than London and 50% less than other UK cities. A Â£2,000-2,500 monthly income provides a comfortable lifestyle."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I work remotely for my UK company?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! The digital nomad visa is specifically designed for this. You can work remotely for UK companies while legally residing in Argentina."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Is there British influence in Argentina?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, significant. British immigrants built Argentina's railways, introduced football, polo, and tea culture. You'll find historic Anglo-Argentine clubs and communities."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What about the Falklands issue?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The Falklands/Malvinas remains a sensitive topic. Most Argentines distinguish between British people and British government policy.
